title: Strengthening Machine Learning Practical Skills: Online Collaborative Learning for Language Proficiency Improvement

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and intermediate-level language proficiency
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners improve linguistic expressiveness by over 20% through the process of exchanging peer feedback in online discussions

Learners can proactively lead group meetings at least twice a week in a 3-person team project using mobile collaboration tools such as Figma, Notion, and Slack, create a role division plan signed by at least two out of three team members, and achieve a score of 4 or higher (on a 5-point scale) in at least four out of five peer evaluation rubric items after project completion.
Learners propose three strategies to address participation disparity issues in asynchronous interactions

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
